name: Assimilation (itch) (Jp.olwagen)
description:
Game myself and Lian Kruger made for the DiscordJam2 game jam. 

The basic concept is that you are an alien that can assimilate and impersonate humans and every day objects. Every level begins on a space ship and you have a set number of orbs to pick up, whilst using your abilities to remain undetected.

The game is really rough as this is also our first game we've made in Unity, so any feedback is appreciated!
